scripts.start:cli: npm run build --prefix cli && npm run start --prefix cli
scripts.docker:check: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs --tail=100 backend frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm --prefix backend run lint:fix && npm --prefix frontend run lint:fix && npm --prefix cli run lint:fix
scripts.type:check: npm --prefix backend run type:check && npm --prefix frontend run type:check && npm --prefix cli run type:check
scripts.build:check: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix cli run build
scripts.check: npm run lint:fix && npm run type:check && npm run build:check && npm run docker:check
scripts.install:cli:global: npm --prefix cli install && npm --prefix cli run build && cd cli && pkg=$(npm pack) && npm install -g "$pkg"
